data.name: Astra Wing
data.detailed_description:
Gear up For 3D Rail Shooting Action in Astra Wing.

As the Ace Space Pilot Astra you'll
Dodge, Barrel Roll, Dip, Duck, Shoot, and Dive your way through a number of levels to clear your name from intergalactic crimes!
Classic no thrills, or gimmicks 3D Linear Rail shooting. Enjoy some fast paced Tech tunes pumping you up to the moment and helping you cruise under enemy lasers and obstacles and debris in your way. While finding your opening to shoot back. Be ready to fight everything from small turrets and drones to ships so large you have to focus out certain systems like their power generators or engines to get through. Your co-pilot Rust will set up your ship's main path in most levels making it so you can focus on avoiding enemy fire and debris and take on ships who stand in your path. In a other levels you'll be more stationary your back up against the wall moving in a confined area to take out the approaching enemies and they're weaponry.

Astra Wing is sure to strike a chord with those who want a straightforward linear rail shooter especially in the sci-fi realm with a focus on stylistic low poly graphics, bright visuals, and catchy jams to match. Expect a bit of fun through the storytelling along the way and some tense moments as you push your piloting ability to get Astra and friends out of tough situations.



Twelve levels of fast paced linear rail shooting
Cutscenes between every level
Included bonus cut content for those wanting more
Incredibly quick learning curve to get you straight into the fun

data.short_description: Sci-Fi Rail shooting in 3D with no gimmicks. Enjoy a simple addicting slice of the genre shooting and dodging and barrel rolling through over ten levels with quick cutscenes in between each while fun tunes pump along to your space piloting.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 3.5ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: These notes are targeting well over 30 FPS for vast majority of playthrough. Lower specifications may run into significant frame dips on certain areas.
